sen.j: 五老スカイタワー（ごろうスカイタワー）は、京都府舞鶴市にある塔。
sen.e: Goro Sly Tower is an observation tower located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Goro Sky Tower is an observation tower located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Goro Sky Tower is an observation tower located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 舞鶴市を東西に分ける五老岳にそびえ立つタワーからの展望は、近畿百景第1位に選ばれた舞鶴湾の美しいリアス式海岸と舞鶴市街地が一望することができる。
sen.e: Standing high on top of Mt. Goro which lies in the center of Maizuru City, the tower provides a great view of Maizuru Bay, whose beautiful sawtooth coastline was awarded the most scenic spot in Kinki Area, and the urban district of Maizuru City.

Standing high on top of Mt. Goro which lies in the center of Maizuru City, the tower provides a great view of Maizuru Bay, whose beautiful sawtooth coastline was awarded the most scenic spot in the Kinki Area, and the urban district of Maizuru City.

Standing high on top of Mt. Goro-gadake which lies in the center of Maizuru City, the tower provides a great view of Maizuru Bay, whose beautiful sawtooth coastline was awarded the most scenic spot in the Kinki Area, and the urban district of Maizuru City.

sen.j: 1995年（平成7年）：舞鶴市市制50周年事業として建設。
sen.e: In 1995, it was built as part of the project that commemorates the 50th anniversary of Maizuru's municipality.
In 1995, it was built as part of the project to commemorate the 50th anniversary of Maizuru's municipality.
In 1995, it was built as part of the project to commemorate the fiftieth anniversary of Maizuru's municipality.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.e: 325 m above sea level
325 m above sea level
325 m above sea level
Height: 50.5 m (Observatiion deck: 28.2 m)
Height: 50.5 m (Observatiion deck: 28.2 m)
Height: 50.5 meters (Observation deck: 28.2 meters)
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.e: Opening hours
Opening hours
Opening hours

sen.j: 9時～21時（ただし入館は20時30分まで）
sen.e: 9:00 to 21:00 (the entrance gate closes at 20:30.)
9:00 to 21:00 (the entrance gate closes at 20:30.)
9:00 to 21:00 (the entrance gate closes at 20:30.)
Admission fees
Admission fees
Admission fees
Adults (high school students or older): 200 yen
Adults (high school students or older): 200 yen
Adults (high school students or older): 200 yen
Minors (first to 9th grade students): 100 yen
Minors (first to 9th grade students): 100 yen
Minors (first to 9th grade students): 100 yen
Parking
Parking
Parking
Free of charge: available also for motorcoaches
Free of charge (available also for coaches)
Free of charge (available also for coaches)

sen.j: 周辺は、五老ヶ岳公園として、子どもの遊具などが整備されている。
sen.e: Around the tower is Gorogadake Park where children can enjoy play equipment.
Gorogadake Park, where children can enjoy play equipment, is nearby.
Gorogadake Park, where children can enjoy play equipment, is nearby.

sen.j: また、西舞鶴への登山「ロータリーの道」、東舞鶴への遊歩道が整備されている。
sen.e: There are a hiking trail 'Rotari no Michi' to the hills of Nishi Maizuru area, and a nature walking trail to Higashi Maizuru area.
There are hiking trails such as 'Rotari no Michi' towards the hills of the Nishi Maizuru area, and a nature walking trail to the Higashi Maizuru area.
sen.cmt: 「a hiking trail」→「hiking trails such as」, 「to」→「towards」, 「the」挿入
sen.e: There are hiking trails such as 'Rotari no Michi' (Rotary Road) towards the hills of the Nishi Maizuru area, and a nature walking trail to the Higashi Maizuru area.
sen.cmt: ロータリーの道 の補足を追加しました。

sen.j: また、すぐそばに「かんぽの宿舞鶴」（改装中）がある。
sen.e: Kanpo no Yado Maizuru' (an accommodation facility in Maizuru: under refurbishment) is very close to this tower.
Kanpo no Yado Maizuru' (an accommodation facility in Maizuru which is under refurbishment) is very close to the tower.
Kanpo no Yado Maizuru' (an accommodation facility in Maizuru which is under refurbishment) is very close to the tower.

sen.j: 所在地：京都府舞鶴市上安小安小字暮谷
sen.e: Location: Koaza Kuredani, Koyasu, Ueyasu, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture
Location: Koaza Kuredani, Koyasu, Ueyasu, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture
Location: Koaza Kuredani, Koyasu, Ueyasu, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture

sen.j: 舞鶴観光周遊バス「プリーズ号」で直通。
sen.e: Maizuru Sightseeing Round-trip Bus 'Please Go' (プリーズ号) takes you to this Tower.
Maizuru Sightseeing Round-trip Bus 'Please Go' (プリーズ号) takes you to this Tower.
Maizuru Sightseeing Round-trip Bus 'Please Go' (プリーズ号) takes you to this Tower.

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道西舞鶴駅から京都交通 (舞鶴)五老岳公園口バス停下車で徒歩約45分。
sen.e: From JR Nishi-Maizuru Station, take Kyoto Kotsu Bus, and get off at (Maizuru) "Gorogadake Koenguchi" bus stop, and it takes 45 minutes on foot.
From JR Nishi-Maizuru Station, take the Kyoto Kotsu Bus, and get off at (Maizuru) "Gorogadake Koenguchi" bus stop, and it takes 45 minutes on foot.
From JR Nishi-Maizuru Station, take the Kyoto Kotsu Bus, and get off at (Maizuru) "Gorogadake Koenguchi" bus stop, and it takes forty-five minutes on foot.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: JR西舞鶴駅から車・タクシーで約15分。
sen.e: From JR Nishi-Maizuru Station, a taxi will take you to the tower in approximately 15 minutes.
From JR Nishi-Maizuru Station, a taxi will take you to the tower in approximately 15 minutes.
From JR Nishi-Maizuru Station, a taxi will take you to the tower in approximately fifteen minutes.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。
